about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Crying Suns


Discover the atmospheric 17-track album from the tactical rogue-lite game "Crying Suns", a dark ambient electronic music that will plunge you into the deep post-apocalyptic universe of the game.

High quality FLAC versions and MP3 versions.

Composed by Aymeric Schwartz
detailed_description:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 655 MB available space
